"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import { Filter, SlidersHorizontal } from "lucide-react" import ProductCard from "../components/ProductCard" import { products } from "../data/products" export default function ProductsPage() { const location = useLocation() const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search) const categoryParam = searchParams.get("category") const waxParam = searchParams.get("wax") const [filteredProducts, setFilteredProducts] = useState(products) const [showFilters, setShowFilters] = useState(false) const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ category: categoryParam || "all", waxType: waxParam || "all", priceRange: "all", }) useEffect(() => { let result = [...products] // Filter by category if (filters.category !== "all") { result = result.filter((product) => product.category === filters.category) } // Filter by wax type (only for cup candles) if (filters.waxType !== "all") { result = result.filter((product) => product.waxType === filters.waxType) } // Filter by price range if (filters.priceRange !== "all") { switch (filters.priceRange) { case "under300": result = result.filter((product) => product.price < 300) break case "300to500": result = result.filter((product) => product.price >= 300 && product.price <= 500) break case "500to700": result = result.filter((product) => product.price > 500 && product.price <= 700) break case "over700": result = result.filter((product) => product.price > 700) break default: break } } setFilteredProducts(result) }, [filters]) // Update filters when URL params change useEffect(() => { const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search) const categoryParam = searchParams.get("category") const waxParam = searchParams.get("wax") if (categoryParam) { setFilters((prev) => ({ ...prev, category: categoryParam })) } if (waxParam) { setFilters((prev) => ({ ...prev, waxType: waxParam })) } }, [location.search]) return (
